name: Trans Employment Program (TEP)
description: UPDATE 9/8/25: Due to our team’s limited capacity, we are pausing intakes until further notice. For community members interested in a new intake enrollment, please stay tuned for updates in January 2026. We highly encourage folks to join us for our weekly drop-in support and coworking hours. Thank you for your patience. Weekly Drop-In Virtual: Mondays from 2 – 3 PM In-person: Thursdays from 12 – 1:30 PM Weekly Coworking Hours In-person: Wednesdays 11 AM – 1 PM The Trans Employment Program (TEP)

howToGetIt: For the Trans Employment Program call (415) 865-5614 or email employmentservices@sfcenter.org to participate.
